titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Wei E writings
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Shang Li

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2017-08-01T08:17-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: Inventory and Chinese language descriptions added by Shang Li.

did.abstract: Relates to post-1949 Chinese history. Includes summaries of interviews with Deng Xiaoping, Jiang Zemin and Yang Shangkun.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Use copies of computer media in this collection are available for immediate access.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Wei E writings, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 2006.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Taiwanese historian. Also known as "Wei-Wuo" or "魏萼".

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Relates to post-1949 Chinese history. Includes summaries of interviews with Deng Xiaoping, Jiang Zemin and Yang Shangkun.
含1949年后中国历史。其中包括邓小平，江泽民，和杨尚昆的面谈记录。

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note 范围和内容
scopecontent.p: 含魏萼透过国共领袖对中国的过去与未来的分析，知名人物包括邓小平，孙逸仙，蒋经国，杨尚昆，蒋介石，胡耀邦，赵紫阳，江泽民，叶剑英，廖承志，宋美龄。

"China's Puzzles and Strategies." Includes Wei's analysis on China's past and future through notable historical figures, namely Deng Xiaoping, Sun Yixian, Jiang Jingguo/Chiang Ching-kuo, Yang Shangkun, Chiang Kai-shek, Hu Yaobang, Zhao Ziyang, Jiang Zemin, Ye Jianying, Liao Chengzhi, and Madame Chiang Kai-shek/Soong Meiling.

did.unittitle: 杨尚昆先生与变局中的中国,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note 范围和内容
scopecontent.p: 含86张杨尚昆先生和国共领导人照片集。其中包括国家主席习近平，邓小平，江泽民，蒋经国，陈立夫。

"Mr. Yang Shangkun and China in Change." Contains 86 photos of Mr. Yang Shangkun and leadership from the Chinese Communist Party and Kuomintang (Nationalist Party), including chairman Xi Jinping, Deng Xiaoping, Jiang Zemin, Jiang Jingguo/ Chiang Ching-kuo, Chen Lifu and more.

did.unittitle: 杨尚昆先生与变局中的中国 (1907-1998), CD-R,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note 范围和内容
scopecontent.p: 包含文本和数字图像的处理文件。内容创建于1990-2000年间。同时具备印刷文件。
One word processing file (.007 GB) containing text and digital images. Content created circa 1990-2000. Printed copy also available (see previous entry).
